ModMetaData.name: No Siege Raids
ModMetaData.author: Laureeeeeeeeeeeeeeen
ModMetaData.description:
Disables siege-type raids as well as auto mortars within mech clusters. The raids still happen but a different strategy is chosen.
Load after any mod which adds new incidents/raids. Note: While this should work fine on 1.4 with Royalty I have only tested it on 1.5 with all DLCs, good luck!
